item.description:
Start off summer with seafood, socializing and the Shotz Band.
Last time we went to this new venue we had a good time. The dance floor is a good size and those who ate there said the food was good. It is also easy to get to, located in the Days Hotel right off of Rte 93. The band is recommended by a "friend."
THE SHOTZ BAND features a phenomenal line-up of Local Rock Musicians with Decades of Experience playing Classic Rock the only way they have ever known: LOUD and PROUD! http://www.lowellrock...

Check out the menu:
http://www.neseafoods...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner and Dancing at New England Seafood
